15template <typename IdxT>
16METAL_FUNC size_t offset_neg_idx(IdxT idx, size_t size) {
17 if (is_unsigned_v<IdxT>) {
18 return idx;
19 } else {
20 return (idx < 0) ? idx + size : idx;
21 }
